mapper.sql: ID, begin_time, end_time, meeting_subject, meeting_place, remark, isdelete, createtime, am_pm, ispublish, createrid, type
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_xietong_agenda
order by ${orderByClause}

begin_time,
end_time,

meeting_place,

mapper.update:
update t_xietong_agenda
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_time = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
meeting_subject = #{record.meetingSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_place = #{record.meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdelete = #{record.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
am_pm = #{record.amPm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ispublish = #{record.ispublish,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createrid = #{record.createrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_xietong_agenda set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_time = #{record.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_subject = #{record.meetingSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_place = #{record.meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{record.isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, am_pm = #{record.amPm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ispublish = #{record.ispublish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createrid = #{record.createrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_xietong_agenda
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
meeting_subject = #{meetingSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meeting_place = #{meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
am_pm = #{amPm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ispublish = #{ispublish,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createrid = #{createrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_xietong_agenda set begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, meeting_subject = #{meetingSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_place = #{meetingPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, am_pm = #{amPm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ispublish = #{ispublish,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createrid = #{createrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from t_xietong_agenda where id in (select distinct t.agenda_id from t_xietong_agenda_human t where t.isdelete=1
and t.participant_id = #{remark}
)
and begin_time >=#{beginTime}/*STR_TO_DATE(,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")*/ and end_time >=#{beginTime}/*STR_TO_DATE(,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")*/
and begin_time <=#{endTime}/*STR_TO_DATE(,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")*/ and end_time <=#{endTime}/*STR_TO_DATE(,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s")*/
and isdelete=1
ORDER BY ispublish,begin_time
